name: Every roses has its bone
description:
This is the special piece for achieving 1k friends on twitter, this is a historical piece for me.

Every roses has its bone, the title suggest by SWEET.
For me the beautiful thing like roses who the petal is soft and weak when it get blossom, there is a core inside and strong stalk, interpret as a skull and bone root. And that beauty is also not gonna long last, death will always come to the living, depicted as skull around the roses petal. So as long as we live we have to be strong, humble, and be kind, that can help us keep going whenever in a difficult condition.

Thank you community, thank you collector.
I believe in my art, still experimenting practice and improving. I hope some day i found what style i comfortable to making, and become my traits identity. I enjoy the process even now and for this piece. 
I also wanna see how i grow.
Thank you for supporting me, 
I really appreciated it.
I love you all.
